song.title: For You, o Lord
song.lyrics:
[C] For You, o Lord, I sing my song of joy; How great You are, o my God! With all my heart, I give You honour and thanks, I offer You endless praise.
[V1] See I stand before You Lord, Prepared to follow your way. In your hand I put my trust; Take me Lord!
[V2] Lord, I lift my hands on high, I praise your glorious name ; You have taught my lips to sing Of your praise!
[V3] For your glory, Lord, is great, And great your marvels for me; By your light You have dispelled All my fears!
[V4] I will never cease to praise, Proclaim and honour You Lord; For your glory I will sing, Holy Lord!
